definition: to give credit/to give sb his due/attribution

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: This wonder can only be credited to the nature.
sentences.chinese: 這種巧奪天工只能歸功於大自然。

sentences.english: Family support was a strong motivation for Wing Chau's success.
sentences.chinese: 陳永洲將學業上的成就歸功於家人的支持。

sentences.english: Does the modern world owe its very existence to the humble spud?
sentences.chinese: 現代世界的存在要歸功於微不足道的馬鈴薯？

sentences.english: Be open to growing in that direction. You owe it to yourself.
sentences.chinese: 請放開向夢想的方向成長吧，這歸功於你自己。

sentences.english: Her worldwide fame is his support.
sentences.chinese: 她名揚四海應歸功於他的支持。

sentences.english: All this above imputes or contributes to the communication su ort.
sentences.chinese: 以上這些都可以歸罪於或歸功於通信保障。

sentences.english: Beijing's gains have come as part of a vast and expensive cleanup program. Nearly 60,000 pollution-spewing coal-fired boilers were switched to cleaner energy sources like natural gas.
sentences.chinese: 北京的成功要部分歸功於一個龐大而昂貴的清潔項目。

sentences.english: " Android's success can be attributed to "communication service providers' marketing and vendor support," Gartner said.
sentences.chinese: 而安卓的成功則要歸功於運營商和供貨商的支持。

sentences.english: She owes her success to diligence.
Their in creasing profits is due to their innovative market strategy.
sentences.chinese: 他們利潤的增長歸功於其富有創新精神的市場戰略。

sentences.english: Mr. Dolittle attributes his good health to careful living.
sentences.chinese: 杜立德先生把自己健壯的體魄歸功於審慎的生活方式。

sentences.english: Credit this success to their utilization of the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 他們的成功要歸功於對互聯網的利用。

sentences.english: This pristine impression is partly due to Bhutan's strong commitment to environmental preservation.
sentences.chinese: 這種質樸的印象部分要歸功於不丹對環境保護的重視。

sentences.english: Her worldwide fame is due to his support.
sentences.chinese: 她名揚四海應歸功於他的支持。

sentences.english: This practice was called Real Estate Redlining and it was exposed thanks to aggregate data analysis.
sentences.chinese: 這叫做“房地產紅線”，這都要歸功於數據的分析。

sentences.english: Honda scored just six points all year courtesy of team-mate Jenson Button.
sentences.chinese: 本田全年只積了6分，還都歸功他的隊友花頓。
